updates.title: New features
updates.content: - QoL changes, new features, and new UI.

updates.title: Bug fixes
updates.content:
- Fixed stock market jiggling on some screens.
- Minified game files.
- Added a loading screen.

updates.title: Quality of life changes
updates.content:
- Words now shift per line typed instead of after each word.
- Achievements are always visible.
- Reduced high-resolution texture sizes for faster loading times.
- 10 Finger assist and falling word effects are now optional.
